message: Bob, I'm offering you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product that I believe will be of great interest to you. While I cannot disclose the exact nature of the product, I can assure you it holds immense value and potential. I'm willing to part with it for $1750000.  This price reflects the significant worth of the product, but also allows for a mutually beneficial transaction. Consider this a chance to make a strategic acquisition that could yield significant returns.  Let me know your thoughts.
